allong.es

Practical function combinator and decorator recipes inspired by JavaScript Allongé

View on GitHub Try in your browser

about

allong.es is a JavaScript library based on the function combinator and decorator recipes introduced in the book JavaScript Allongé.

Getting Started

In node: “npm install allong.es”

In your browser: http://allong.es/try

Documentation

The decorators and combinators are documented in JavaScript Allongé, and the try in your browser contains lots of examples to play with.

Project Status

All of the combinators and function decorators from JavaScript Allongé are present. allong.es now also includes functional iterator support.

Snarfed From

  • Lemonad
  • Functional JavaScript
  • Underscore

Support or Contact

allong.es was written by Reg Braithwaite (@raganwald). It is published under the MIT License.
